name: ethereum-transaction-with-web3js
description: Ethereum transaction made with web3js library Make pull request of the JS/PY code of Ethereum transaction made with web3js library in Ropsten testnet which sends 0.01 ETH from your account to 0xc53d6c0148ddc28efe623ab3ad54da5c7779b25c with your name in Data field Resources: https://web3js.readthedocs.io/en/v1.7.0/web3-eth.html#sendtransaction https://web3py.readthedocs.io/en/stable/examples.html#making-transactions
